page.title: 04VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: STURTON-LE-STEEPLE VILLAGE. Sturton-le-Steeple is a small village but very intersting.Lots of farmers live in Sturton and one of the pilgrim fathers came from Sturton .Sturton has got a playing field and village hall church and chael next year the school will be 150 years old.The pilgrim fathers House is still in the village.We have a beck that runs throug.the village and next to the beck is a pub called the Reinder inn it sells sweets and choclate because Sturton has no shop.There is a small Post Office and Telephone Exethange next to it which is about 7 years old we have two bus stops in the village. The power station provides many jobs for villages.The river Trent runs to the East,about two and ahalf miles away.
